entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 a.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 80 km/h gusting to 100. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then periods of snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
